name: BALANCE 3D - BALL AND PLATFORMS
description:
The player will have to overcome all the obstacles on his way and get to the green platform, be careful, red platforms fall, yellow will knock you down! You will have to balance. Do not rush and do not make sudden movements or you will fall down!

You will have to push platforms to advance, as well as ride on mobile platforms. In General, it will be fun!

Game features: 
- beautiful graphics 
- ability to change the skin of the ball 
- exciting gameplay
- realistic physics of the ball 
- beautiful levels
